O

onButtonStatusReceived(String) - Method in class system.GameController
Sets certain buttons on/off based on the packet received.
onButtonStatusReceived(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when the status of in-game buttons should be updated.
onChatReceived(String) - Method in class system.GameController
When a chat is received by a client, this method tells the server to broadcast that chat to all clients.
onChatReceived(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when a chat message is received from another player.
onClientDrawReceived(String) - Method in class system.GameController
Determines if the client requesting to draw may draw (is it their turn? do they have room in their hand?).
onClientDrawReceived(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when the client receives a draw card action from the server.
onClientPlayReceived(String) - Method in class system.GameController
Determines if a received "play" from a client is legal (is it their turn? is the card a legal play based on the last played card?).
onClientPlayReceived(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when the client receives a play card action from the server.
onClientSuitReceived(String) - Method in class system.GameController
Intermediary step for a client deciding a suit for an eight they have played; at this point the call stack is clear besides this function.
onClientSuitReceived(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when a suit selection made by a player is received.
onClientSuitRequest(String) - Method in class system.GameController
Sends a chosen suit from client to server.
onClientSuitRequest(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when the server requests the client to choose a suit after playing an Eight.
onConsoleMsgReceived(String, String, String) - Method in class system.GameController
When a console message is received from a client, this method tells the server to broadcast that console msg to all clients.
onConsoleMsgReceived(String, String, String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when a message is received for the console output, optionally referencing a player name and card.
onGameOver(String) - Method in class system.GameController
Informs the client of the game winner(s) via dialog.
onGameOver(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when the game is over and a winner is determined.
onGameStateUpdated(String) - Method in class system.GameController
Informs the server that the amount of players waiting to connect have connected and that the game should start.
onGameStateUpdated(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when the overall game state is updated (e.g., pause, resume).
onHandRefreshed(Vector<Card>) - Method in class system.GameController
Sets up listeners for a client's hand.
onHandRefreshed(Vector<Card>) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when the player's hand is refreshed (e.g., after drawing or reshuffling).
onPlayerConnected(int, int) - Method in class system.GameController
Updates the dialog for the server when it is waiting for new players to connect (visual feedback).
onPlayerConnected(int, int) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when a player connects to the game.
onPlayerDisconnect(String) - Method in class system.GameController
When a player (client) disconnects, shut down their threads, close their socket, and replace their player object with an AI player.
onPlayerDisconnect(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when a player disconnects from the game.
onRoundOver(String) - Method in class system.GameController
Informs the clients of the round winner via dialog.
onRoundOver(String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when a round of the game ends.
onTerminateGameRequest() - Method in class system.GameController
Resets the client's UI to initial state.
onTerminateGameRequest() - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when the game is being terminated by a player or the server.
onViewRefresh(String, String, String, String, String, String, String) - Method in class system.GameController
Refreshes each part of the client's UI with the passed information from the server.
onViewRefresh(String, String, String, String, String, String, String) - Method in interface system.GameControllerListener
Called when the game view should be refreshed.
orientation - Variable in class sysobj.Player
The orientation of the player (e.g., vertical or horizontal).
out - Variable in class system.GameClient
Writer for sending messages to the server.
out - Variable in class system.GameServer
Output writer
